participating-org.narrative: CDD is a civil society organization established to contribute to the democratic and socio-economic development of Mozambique. Are also a catalyst for the transformational potential of Youth and Guardian of Democracy and Human Rights in Mozambique. CDD'smission isto catalyze capacity development, with a focus on youth; mobilize public opinion and provide an independent space for critical reflection on the challenges to democratization and socio-economic development in Mozambique and the region. The CDDwas founded in 2018 by a group of Mozambican citizens inspired by the Vision of an inclusive, democratic and developmentalist Mozambican society, with respect for Human Rights.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to social and political participation
